data.comment: 300 spectators are watching the match in Monchengladbach.
The big names in today's match at Borussia-Park have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Daniel Schlager, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Wolfsburg.
M´gladbach push upfield and Lars Stindl gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Wolfsburg defence.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 3, Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 7, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, M´gladbach are whistled for offside.
Maximilian Arnold for Wolfsburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Daniel Schlager awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
In the minute 11, M´gladbach's Marcus Thuram breaks free at Borussia-Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
Daniel Schlager signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
In the minute 16, Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach drive upfield and Florian Neuhaus gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
In the minute 18, Wolfsburg's Josip Brekalo gets in a shot but it is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Wolfsburg surge into the attack at Borussia-Park but Wout Weghorst’s header is off-target.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
Florian Neuhaus (M´gladbach) has hit the post with a header.
In the minute 21, In Monchengladbach, Breel Embolo of M´gladbach is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Wolfsburg.
Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 24, Wolfsburg's Wout Weghorst misses with an attempt on goal.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 25, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jerome Roussillon.
Jerome Roussillon is back on his feet again.
Attention is being given to Wolfsburg’s Admir Mehmedi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 28, Daniel Schlager awards the home team a throw-in.
Admir Mehmedi for Wolfsburg is back on the field again.
M´gladbach push forward at Borussia-Park and Lars Stindl gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Wolfsburg defence.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Jonas Hofmann of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in M´gladbach.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
In Monchengladbach M´gladbach attack through Breel Embolo. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 34, Daniel Schlager signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in M´gladbach's half.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
M´gladbach are coming forward and Jonas Hofmann gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the away team in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach, Wolfsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Josip Brekalo fires in a strike for Wolfsburg.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Lars Stindl's finish is wide of the goal.
Daniel Schlager awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Free kick Wolfsburg.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Wolfsburg.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to M´gladbach just outside Wolfsburg's area.
Nico Elvedi's header is off-target for M´gladbach.
In the minute 42, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Daniel Schlager signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 44, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 45, M´gladbach needs to be cautious. Wolfsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Wolfsburg in Monchengladbach.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Borussia-Park.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
Josip Brekalo for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at Borussia-Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The away team have replaced Xaver Schlager with Yannick Gerhardt. This is the first substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
In the minute 48, M´gladbach to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Wolfsburg.
In the minute 49, Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Play has been interrupted briefly in Monchengladbach to check on Stefan Lainer, who is grimacing with pain.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
M´gladbach’s Stefan Lainer is on his feet again at Borussia-Park.
In the minute 54, Can M´gladbach capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of M´gladbach.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 56, Ball goes out of play for a M´gladbach goal kick.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi gets in a shot on goal at Borussia-Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 57, It's a goal kick for the home team in Monchengladbach.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 60, M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Daniel Schlager blows for offside.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 63, Wolfsburg push upfield but Daniel Schlager quickly pulls them for offside.
Wolfsburg drives forward and Maximilian Arnold gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Wolfsburg are coming forward and Ridle Baku gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 63, Daniel Schlager awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matthias Ginter for M´gladbach who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 65, Matthias Ginter is back on the pitch.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 67, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Josip Brekalo (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Monchengladbach a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Marco Rose is making the team's first substitution at Borussia-Park with Patrick Herrmann replacing Breel Embolo.
In the minute 70, Hannes Wolf is on a sub for Lars Stindl for M´gladbach.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
At Borussia-Park, Wolfsburg are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 74, M´gladbach have been given a penalty...
Koen Casteels is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
The home team replace Oscar Wendt with Ramy Bensebaini.
In the minute 77, At Borussia-Park, Florian Neuhaus has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Josuha Guilavogui (Wolfsburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Wolfsburg's Koen Casteels is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 78, It's advantage M´gladbach in Monchengladbach as Jonas Hofmann scores from the spot to make it 1-0.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Daniel Schlager awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Tony Jantschke is replacing Stefan Lainer for the home team.
Wolfsburg make their second substitution with Renato Steffen replacing Admir Mehmedi.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 83, Daniel Schlager waits before resuming play because Marcus Thuram for M´gladbach is still down.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
M´gladbach's Marcus Thuram is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 85, Wout Weghorst is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Ridle Baku instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 86, Free kick M´gladbach.
Ibrahima Traore is replacing Marcus Thuram for M´gladbach at Borussia-Park.
Corner awarded to M´gladbach.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 89, Wolfsburg are caught offside.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg make their third substitution with Maximilian Philipp replacing Josip Brekalo.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Wolfsburg.
At Borussia-Park the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Daniel Schlager signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Wolfsburg's area.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Borussia-Park.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Wout Weghorst gets his shot on target but fails to score for Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Daniel Schlager.
Daniel Schlager signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Patrick Herrmann for M´gladbach has been booked by Daniel Schlager and receives a first yellow card.
